response.overview: Inside the AACTA Studio returns in 2022. Hosted by Gretel Killeen, the one-hour special provides a candid and intimate discussion with some of the nominees of this yearâ€™s awards.  With nominees joining from various corners of the country and globe, Inside the AACTA Studio, explores the diverse range of Australian stories gracing our screens, the importance of storytelling and why these stories have resonated with audiences.
response.title: Inside the AACTA Studio
